articles.description: New rules for ‘buy now, pay later’ companies in Australia
articles.content: Australia has become the first country to implement industry standards for the buy now, pay later (BNPL) sector, designed to ensure safe practices and name and shame dodgy lenders. The new code draft… [+2680 chars]
